```{r}
library(dplyr)
data = read.csv("~/Documents/summerproj/data_science_programming/week_1/day2/dictionary/dictionary_com_output_english_4000.csv", header = TRUE )
data = filter(data, exNum >= 0, X < 4001)

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data, aes( x = 1/n, y = exNum)) + geom_point()
ggplot(data, aes( x = exNum)) + geom_bar()
ggplot(filter(data,exNum < 25), aes( x = exNum)) + geom_bar()
```
